name: Ghosts & Gold
description:
Are you tired of scrolling Reddit or YouTube while you are in queue for a League or Overwatch game? Are you bored of staring at your dying house plant while Destiny 2 or Final Fantasy XV loads? Well, while you wait, play Ghosts & Gold, the perfect minimalist 2d movement based endless survival game inspired by Tetris.

You goal is simple: collect as much gold as you can while dodging falling rocks and old explosive mining equipment.  As you acquire more and more gold, you become more powerful and can unlock new powers.

Features:
  • Simple gameplay: easy to learn, impossible to master
  • 5 unique unlockable abilities that vastly change the game
  • Various tile types including: normal, explosive, and Tetris
  • Endless + random + scaling difficulty = infinite replayability
  • Each round should take 2-5 minutes = perfect for quickly playing
  • Minimalist + low CPU/GPU usage = doesn't use many system resources
  • Multiple control schemes + can play with one hand (no mouse required to play)
  • Fully offline
  • Zero in-game purchases
